title: [SOLVED/CLOSED] High scores not working
body:
Specs
Moto G9 Power
LineageOS 22.1
Android 15

Info:
I take 2 or 3 seconds to complete the test but my highscore shows 82, 12 or 7 seconds. If needed i can upload a video playing with w/ a timer on screen.
author: artur15lima

comments.body: Hi, the timer starts the moment the numbers become visible on the screen, not after you press 1. Please confirm that this is how you're timing yourself too.
Ok, now i understand it. Tysm.

satisfaction_conditions: Clarification about when the timer starts in the game
Explanation for the discrepancy between perceived completion time and recorded high scores
